Tectran's AirPower Line is the original 3-in-ONE tractor to trailer hook-up line. It is superior to all substitutes due to its unprecedented grips, WeatherSeal plug sleeves, better flexibility, and thicker beveled-edge spiral wrap. All AirPower Line configurations are available in ArticFlex grade

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines available with black or red/blue
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevents kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  •  1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

AirPower Line TEC-CLAMP No tools needed. CLAMP. LOCK. GO (Patent: D794,439)

 

Related Tectran patents: Pending   D794,439   Pending

node.description:
Used to connect a second tractor/trailer where auxiliary style connectors are required. This is the same ABS cable construction as the standard "ATG" series but is fitted with plugs which have inverted (male) ground pins to prevent incorrect connections.

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines available with black or red/blue
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • Auxiliary power line  fitted with plugs that have an inverted (male) ground pin
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable
  • Hanger bracket mounting assembly included

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevents kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

node.description:
Used to connect a second tractor/trailer where auxiliary style connectors are required. This is the same ABS cable construction as the standard "ATG" series but is fitted with plugs which have inverted (male) ground pins to prevent incorrect connections.

  • (1) Red & (1) Blue 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air line
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • Auxiliary power line  fitted with plugs that have an inverted (male) ground pin
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable
  • Hanger bracket mounting assembly included

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevents kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

node.description:
The Industry Grade series of AirPower Lines was designed with the cost-conscious customer in mind. It combines proven features with an overlay of key upgrades to strike the perfect balance of value and performance.

 3/8" ID Rubber Air Hoses: SAE J1402 & DOT FMVSS No. 106 Compliant 

  • Molded elastomeric gladhand grips prevent kinking during tight turns 
  • Uniform, dual-braided hose design with interwoven spirals for excellent flexibility and durability
  • Rugged, fully bonded hose cover resists abrasion, UV, diesel, and commonly encountered chemicals
  • All brass 1/2" NPT fixed trailer side fittings 
  • 1/2" NPT swivel tractor side fittings with spring guards 

7-Way Cable: ABS Ready (4/12-2/10-1/8) with SAE J560 Plugs

  • Spring guards protect cable during tight turns 
  • SAE J560 plugs with tapered fit spring guards to protect the cable during tight turns
  • Rugged cable jacket resists abrasion, UV, diesel, and commonly encountered chemicals
  • Heavy-duty metal plug housings with double gusseted handles
  • Meets performance requirements of SAE J2394

Spiral Wrap & Clamp

  • Heavy-duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut spiral wrap ends protect the hoses and electrical cable by eliminating sharp corners
  • Stainless steel clamp and hardware for suspending the AirPower Line from a tender kit or pogo stick

node.description:
Air and electrical lines are a couple of the most frequently serviced areas on a truck. TECTRANs LIFELine® Kits offer a complete, ready to install Connection System made with premium products. Providing a comprehensive solution to common maintenance problems, LIFELine® Kits greatly extend the service life of the lines.

Standard on all LIFELine® Kits  

  •  All LIFELine® Kits use matched lines and are pre-clamped to ensure a uniform working length
  • TEC-360 Clamp - The Tec-360° swivel top allows for the AirPower Line to rotate freely which prevents binding, interlocked springs, and stress on connection points. Easy to use aluminum locking clasp  - No tools needed!  
  • LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)
  • FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)
  • Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)
  • Top-of-the-line corrosion resistant anodized gladhands
  • All powercoils features plugs using TECTRAN's unique WeatherSeal sleeve - A weatherproof barrier, protecting critical wire connections from corrosion. Provides excellent strain relief, minimizing pull stress on connections
  • LIFELine® Kits for Tender/Slider Bar applications include a dual-spring tender kit to ensure the weight of the lines is supported during the full range of movement.
  • LIFELine® Kits for Pogo Stick do not include a pogo stick - pogo sticks sold separately.

node.description:
Another Industry First! Tectran revolutionized the standard 3-hole clamp for tractor-trailer connection lines with the patented TEC-Clamp and now has set the bar even higher with the new 3-Hole TEC-360 Clamp (US Pat. D795052). It can be installed and adjusted without any hardware or tools needed and the TEC-360 swivel top allows for the connection system to rotate and move freely during use in order to prevent:

 Binding & tangling
 Interlocked tender kit springs
 Stress on connection points

360° View:

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Rotate
Right Mouse Button: Pan
Scroll Wheel: Zoom
Double-click: Reset View
Shift + Left Mouse Button: Rotate Lights

 

: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm - www.p65warnings.ca.gov
node.resources: • 3-Hole TEC-360 Clamp

node.description:
An Industry First! The AirPower Line TEC-360 Clamp offers the same robust features as our original AirPower Line TEC-CLAMP with the added feature of the red swivel top. The TEC-360 swivel top allows for the AirPower Line to rotate freely which prevents binding, interlocked springs, and stress on connection points.  (Patents: D794,440, 172406)

  • Stainless steel Speed Clip for quick and easy installation.
  • Red swivel top allows for a full 360° of rotation - no binding! 
  • Heavy duty composite body provides superior strength and high performance in the most extreme application environments. 
  • Clamp body ID is optimized to fit TECTRAN's 3-In-One AirPower Lines but can also clamp a wide range of competitive spiral wrapped air and power line combinations.
  • Easy to use aluminum locking clasp  - No tools needed!

All the same protective armor coating as the ARMORFLEX-HD line with the added benefit of Fused Technology bonding the lines together into one single unit. This Fuse Technology allows for the most tangle free, coiled tractor-trailer connection system in the industry!

  • Tubing features polyurethane covered Armor Coating that is rugged, abrasion and cut resistant
  • -85°F extreme cold flexibility rating
  • Unique manufacturing process ensures outer jacket maintains permanent bond with inner tubing
  • Made with premium, unprocessed virgin nylon constructed tubing

node.description:
Tectran's new, durable Clamp Solution! (Patents: D722,867 D761,643 D761,644)

Hooking-up tractor/trailer connection lines just got easier! The new 3 hole TEC-CLAMPallows you to lock in your lines and go! No tools or hardware needed for fast, easy installations! Versatile design can be used with both rubber air hose or coiled tubing connections.

  • Stainless Steel or E-Coated clip options
  • For use with both Tender kit & Pogo Stick suspension devices
  • Heavy duty clamp design - Superior strength and high performance in the most extreme application environments
  • Easy to use locking clasp - built to withstand high frequency clamping & unclamping
  • No tools needed!
  • Red power tab provides maximum application versatility
  • Corrosion resistant composite body
  • Hose Keeper holds each line in place while installing the other line
  • Quick guide installation instructions embossed on clamp body

node.description:
V-line aircoils featuring a LIFESwivel® 1/2" live swivel tractor fitting for faster installations

  • Made with premium, unprocessed virgin nylon constructed tubing
  • -45°F cold flexibility rating
  • TECTRANs Anti-Sag and Stretch manufacturing & coiling process
  • DOT brass fittings with TECTRAN identifier
  • Plated spring guards
  • Spring guards closed coils extend well past 2 from fitting, exceeding DOT regulations
  • 1/2 tube O.D. 
  • Fittings:  1/2 LIFESwivel tractor fitting thread, 1/2 trailer fitting thread
  • Exceeds DOT FMVSS 106 - (49 CFR 571.106 & 49 CFR 393.45)

 

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on tractor end of the coil
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

node.description:
Part of the Next Generation of TEC-Clamps, the patented TEC-360 CLAMP (US Patent D794440) is a versatile, heavy duty clamp with an integrated 360° swivel. The TEC-360 CLAMP swivel top allows for the clamp to rotate freely while in service which prevents binding, tangling, interlocked tender kit springs, and stress on connection points.

Highly corrosion resistant and durable, the TEC-360 CLAMP provides steady and dependable performance in extreme application environments.

Common Applications May Include Suspending:

  • Hydraulic Hoses
  • Wrapped Tractor-Trailer Connections
  • Bundles of Hose, Cable, and Tubing
  • Suction and Discharge Hoses

CLAMP.LOCK.GO - No tools needed! 

: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm - www.p65warnings.ca.gov

node.productname: Air Line Hose Assemblies with FLEXGrip-HD Black Hose
node.description:
• Designed to withstand application extremes - The uniform dual-braided design consists of interwoven spirals providing greater flexibility and improved twist resistance compared to other spiral designs
  • 3/8" hose I.D - 1/2" end fittings
  • Layers of the hose wall are fully bonded to enhance kink resistance, enabling tighter bends
  • Provides flexible air-connection from frame to axle or between tractor and trailer where exposed to flexing, pulling or impact
  • The rugged elastomeric hose cover is resistant to gasoline, diesel fuel, oil and commonly used road and cleaning chemicals
  • UV and ozone resistant
  • Designed for operating pressures up to 225 psi
  • Operating temperature of -40°F to +200°F (-40°C to +93°C)
  • Meets or exceeds SAE J1402 - Type A - DOT FMVSS No. 106 - Brake Hoses, 49 CFR 571.106

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads. (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevent kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

HEX-GRIP Pack 1-Red & 1-Blue

  • Helps prevent air line kinking at the fitting
  • One piece design
  • No screws or plastic parts
  • Easy to install aluminum HEX construction
  • Class II anodized coating provides greater corrosion-resistance

 

: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm - www.p65warnings.ca.gov

The patented TEC-CLAMP (patent D794,439) is a versatile, heavy duty clamp that is available in a variety of sizes and configurations. Common applications may include suspending hydraulic hoses, wrapped tractor-trailer connections, and other bundles of hose, cable, and tubing. No tools are required to open and close the clamp so installation and adjustment are quick and simple.

  • Stainless steel clip for easy installation
  • Rugged composite body holds up in extreme application environments
  • The clamp hinge is fully integrated into the housing for maximum durability
  • Wide clamp profile distributes the load
  • Color-coded bottom half for fast identification
  • Innovative and secure clasp can be opened and closed by hand with NO TOOLS REQUIRED
  • Weight Limit: 100 lb Torque Limit: 5 lb-ft

node.description:
The convenience of the AirPower Line plus an added Tailgate Powerline

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • Single pole / Single cable power line
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevents kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  •  1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

TEC-CLAMP - No tools needed for installation or adjustment. CLAMP. LOCK. GO.

  • 1.75 ID Tec-Clamp for suspending APL assembly.
  •  2-Hole Tec-Clamps at each end to help suspend 4th line when not in use.

  • Color-coded plastic handle
  • Stainless steel screws offer superior corrosion resistance
  • Non-slip, hex shaped body is made from a high impact, UV resistant polymer that is significantly more shatter-proof than other brands

node.description:
The convenience of the AirPower Line plus an added Tailgate powerline featuring Tectran's DOUBLEDUAL one-plug Solution. The DOUBLEDUAL dual pole plug is universally configured to function with both vertical or horizontal socket designs. Simply your connection lines with this universal plug option.

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • Dual Pole, 4 gauge power line SAE J3082 compliant  
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  DOT compliant reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads provides strain relief  (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  •  1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

TEC-CLAMP - No tools needed for installation or adjustment. CLAMP. LOCK. GO.

  • 1.75 ID Tec-Clamp for suspending APL assembly  Part no. 98175ST(patent D794,439)
  •  2-Hole Tec-Clamps at each end to help suspend 4th line when not in use  Part no. 9887 (patent D761,643)

  • Abrasion resistant outer jacket is highly resistant to UV rays and commonly encountered chemicals such as diesel fuel and hydraulic oil
  • Die-cast SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with heavy duty double gusseted handles come standard 
  • Available with Spring Guard or Tectran's unique WeatherSeal

node.description:
The ideal connection solution for severe weather. Low temperature grade rubber air hoses and ABS power line are made to perform in the most extreme weather conditions.

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines
  • ARTICFLEX air lines rated to -65°F
  • ABS power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • ABS ARTICFLEX power line rated to -85°F
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge blue spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle. Blue wrap represents ARTICFLEX Grade Assembly.
  • Spoon cut end on spiral wrap eliminates sharp end which can damage the hose or electric cable

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevent kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

AirPower Line TEC-CLAMP  No tools needed. CLAMP. LOCK. GO (D794,439)

node.productname: Air Line Hose Assemblies with Spring Guards
node.description:
• Swivel fitting at tractor end - for easy installation
  • Spring guards offer strain relief
  • 3/8" hose I.D - 1/2" end fittings
  • Designed to withstand application extremes - The uniform dual-braided design consists of interwoven spirals providing greater flexibility and improved twist resistance compared to other spiral designs
  • Layers of the hose wall are fully bonded to enhance kink resistance, enabling tighter bends
  • Provides flexible air-connection from frame to axle or between tractor and trailer where exposed to flexing, pulling or impact
  • The rugged elastomeric hose cover is resistant to gasoline, diesel fuel, oil and commonly used road and cleaning chemicals
  • UV and ozone resistant
  • Designed for operating pressures up to 225 psi
  • Operating temperature of -40°F to +200°F (-40°C to +93°C)
  • Meets or exceeds SAE J1402 - Type A - DOT FMVSS No. 106 - Brake Hoses, 49 CFR 571.106

node.description:
The Industry's FIRST 90° gladhand! Tectran's premium corrosion resistant gladhands are now available in a 90° angle mount to support horizontal connections. The perfect Solution for applications where gladhands are mounted very low in the trailer. The 90° body design will assist in raising the air lines, keeping them from getting caught on the quarter fender, stairs, deck, or other tractor mounted accessories. (Patent: D784,641)

  • Anodized Aluminum cast body
  • 101119 series polyurethane wide lipped seals for added durability
  • Stainless Steel fine mesh filter
  • Stainless Steel clamp and hardware
  • Sturdy, barrel type body design & gusset provides additional support against side pull force. Heavy duty body will support the weight of horizontal connections.
  • Plated striker plate

The convenience of the AirPower Line plus an added Tailgate Powerline

  • (2) 3/8 ID SAE J1402 rubber air lines
  • ABS performance power line meets the performance requirements of SAE J2394
  • Dual Pole / Dual Cable power line SAE J3082 compliant 
  • SAE J560 Buffalo Plug with WeatherSeal sleeves for superior corrosion protection and strain relief
  • Heavy duty, beveled edge spiral wrap gathers all lines into a tangle-free bundle

  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

TEC-CLAMP - No tools needed for installation or adjustment. CLAMP. LOCK. GO.

• ARTICFLEX air line hose assemblies are made using special SAE J1402  hose rated for -65°F
  • Blue or Red FLEX-Grips - for gladhand connection and identification
  • Designed to withstand application extremes - The uniform dual-braided design consists of interwoven spirals providing greater flexibility and improved twist resistance compared to other spiral designs
  • 3/8" hose I.D - 1/2" end fittings
  • Layers of the hose wall are fully bonded to enhance kink resistance, enabling tighter bends
  • Provides flexible air-connection from frame to axle or between tractor and trailer were exposed to flexing, pulling or impact
  • The rugged elastomeric hose cover is resistant to gasoline, diesel fuel, oil and commonly used road and cleaning chemicals
  • UV and ozone resistant
  • Designed for operating pressures up to 225 psi
  • Meets or exceeds SAE J1402 - Type A - DOT FMVSS No. 106 - Brake Hoses, 49 CFR 571.106

  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections

For use where a second tractor/trailer connection using auxiliary style connectors is required. These assemblies feature the same cable construction as the ABS ready "ATG" series but are fitted with plugs that have inverted (male) ground pins to prevent incorrect connections.
 
  • Extreme flexibility and coil memory, even in brutally cold conditions as low as -85°F (-65°C)
  • High strand count copper conductors with machine crimped brass terminals for dependable electrical connections
  • Abrasion resistant outer jacket is highly resistant to UV rays and commonly encountered chemicals such as diesel fuel and hydraulic oil
  • Die-cast SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with heavy duty double gusseted handles come standard 
  • Available with Spring Guard or Tectran's unique WeatherSeal

node.productname: Color-Coded Air Line Hose Assemblies FLEXGrip-HD Red/Blue Hose
node.description:
• Color-coded red & blue hose helps minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Blue or Red FLEXGrip-HD - for gladhand connection and identification
  • 3/8" hose I.D - 1/2" end fittings
  • Designed to withstand application extremes - The uniform dual-braided design consists of interwoven spirals providing greater flexibility and improved twist resistance compared to other spiral designs
  • Layers of the hose wall are fully bonded to enhance kink resistance, enabling tighter bends
  • Provides flexible air-connection from frame to axle or between tractor and trailer were exposed to flexing, pulling or impact
  • The rugged elastomeric hose cover is resistant to gasoline, diesel fuel, oil and commonly used road and cleaning chemicals
  • UV and ozone resistant
  • Designed for operating pressures up to 225 psi
  • Operating temperature of -40°F to +200°F (-40°C to +93°C)
  • Meets or exceeds SAE J1402 - Type A - DOT FMVSS No. 106 - Brake Hoses, 49 CFR 571.106

FLEXGrip-HD - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads. (Patent Pending)

  • Our most robust grip for ultimate kink protection!
  • Corrosion resistant all brass fittings
  • Tapered grip flexes with airline during tight turns for advanced kink protection
  • Reinforced, thicker rail at the hose end of the grip prevents tearing and improves kink resistance
  • Color-coded grip helps to minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • FLEXGrip-HD Thread  1/2

Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)

  • Non-corrosive, unlike typical spring guards
  • Color-coded to help minimize incorrect tractor/trailer connections
  • Prevent kinking during tight turns

LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)

  • Fitting located on the tractor side of the assembly
  • Double O-ring leak-free Life design
  • Quick & easy single wrench installations
  • 1/2 Tractor Fitting Threads

node.description:
The TECTRAN® LIFELine® Extension attaches to an existing slider bar and holds your tractor-trailer connections out and away from the back of the cab.

      Prevents connections from hitting the cab and causing damage to the paint, which is costly to repair

      Creates 10 of extra clearance for spare tires, storage racks, and other equipment installed against the back of the cab

      Maintains a linear range of motion so your connections move freely during sharp turns as the truck manufacturer intended

      Easy to mount and provides a rock-solid platform for hanging your connections

 

Required Application Dimensions 

    Part Number         A Dim.         *B Dim.    
8473 1 in 15 in
8477 0.75 in 27 in

*Minimum required, longer length bar is also suitable

node.description:
Air and electrical lines are a couple of the most frequently serviced areas on a truck. TECTRAN®s LIFELine® Kits offer a complete, ready to install Connection System made with premium products. Providing a comprehensive solution to common maintenance problems, LIFELine® Kits greatly extend the service life of the lines.

Standard on all LIFELine® Kits  

  •  All LIFELine® Kits use matched lines and are pre-clamped to ensure a uniform working length
  • LIFESwivel® - A live swivel design featuring all brass construction to eliminate corrosion (Patent Pending)
  • FLEXGrip-SP - A thermo-elastomeric gladhand grip located on the trailer leads (Patent Pending)
  • Bend Restrictors  A thermo-elastomeric reinforcement guard located on the tractor leads (Patent Pending)
  • Top-of-the-line corrosion resistant anodized gladhands
  • All powercoils features plugs using TECTRAN's unique WeatherSeal sleeve - A weatherproof barrier, protecting critical wire connections from corrosion. Provides excellent strain relief, minimizing pull stress on connections
  • LIFELine® Kits for Tender/Slider Bar applications include a dual-spring tender kit to ensure the weight of the lines is supported during the full range of movement.
  • LIFELine® Kits for Pogo Stick do not include a pogo stick - pogo sticks sold separately.

Related Tectran patents: Pending

node.description:
Tectran Seal Tool (D530,576)
 
Installing a new seal
  • When installing a new gladhand seal if center hole appears elongated and cannot move, use the curved edge of the Tectran Seal Tool to help seat your seal properly into the groove of your gladhand.

Removing an old seal

  • Insert knob end of the Tectran Seal Tool into the inside diameter of your seal
  • Firmly pull upward to complete extraction of your seal

node.description:
AN INDUSTRY FIRST - TECTRAN'S ONE-PLUG SOLUTION!  A dual pole plug that is universally configured to function with both vertical and horizontal socket designs. One plug handles all your dual pole application needs!  (D702,189)

Simplified connections eliminate the need to stock multiple dual pole plug and cable assemblies. Simplify fleet equipment with this universal plug option! 

  • Rugged jacket resistant to abrasion, gasoline, diesel, and road chemicals
  • Durable Die-cast Buffalo plugs
  • Unique Tectran WeatherSeal weatherproof barrier, protecting critical wire connections from corrosion
  • High performance & flexibility in temperatures as low as -85°F (-65°C)
  • 4 gauge fine strand copper conductors

node.description:

  • The green cable is used for the main ABS power supply and the yellow cable is used for the secondary or auxiliary power supply

  • Resistant to UV light, ozone, gasoline, diesel, and other commonly encountered chemicals

  • High conductor strand count for excellent flexibility

node.productname: Medium Duty Cable (5/14 2/12 Gauge) (Green, Brown, Blue, Black, Yellow, Red, White)
node.description:
• This unique cable configuration retains the 12-gauge conductor in the heavily loaded  red stop lamp circuit and for the white ground circuit, while providing the economy of 14-gauge wiring for the other circuits
  • This construction is a perfect alternative to 7/14 or 6/14 - 1/2 constructions
  • Not recommended for ABS applications
  • Cable O.D. (Nominal) - 0.555
  • Operating temperature range: -85°F (-65°C) to 176°F (80°C)
  • Up to 3 times more abrasion resistant than competitive cables
  • Resistant to UV light, ozone, gasoline, diesel, and other commonly encountered chemicals
  • High conductor strand count for excellent flexibility

node.resources: • ArticFlex Cable

node.description:
• Premium quality assemblies designed for the demands of modern ABS equipped trailers and for multiple-trailer configurations
  • Extremely flexible, even in brutally cold conditions as low as -85°F (-65°C)
  • High strand count copper conductors with machine crimped brass terminals for dependable electrical connections
  • Abrasion resistant outer jacket is highly resistant to UV rays and commonly encountered chemicals such as diesel fuel and hydraulic oil
  • Die-cast SAE J560 Buffalo Plugs with heavy duty double gusseted handles come standard 
  • All plugs are factory injected with grease for easy installation and corrosion resistance
  • Excellent coil memory meet or exceed SAE J2222 performance standards
